alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama, southeastern Clay, northwestern Baker, Calhoun and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 332 PM EDT/232 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Shellman to 6 miles north of Columbia. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan, Blakely, Edison, Arlington, Columbia, Leary, Douglasville, Centerville, Damascus, Bellville, Haleburg, Bluffton, Iveys Mill, Parksville, Hayes, Holt, Rock Hill, Early Co A/p, Hentown and Suttons Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
